news.title: Govt Announces New Tech Park
news.body: A new state-of-the-art tech park will be established in Dhaka to boost the IT sector. This initiative aims to create thousands of jobs and attract foreign investment in the technology sector. The park will feature modern infrastructure and support services for startups.

news.title: Local Startup Wins Innovation Award
news.body: A Dhaka-based startup has won an international innovation award for AI-driven solutions. The company developed cutting-edge machine learning algorithms that help businesses automate their operations efficiently.
